briefTitle: An Investigational Drug on Clinical Outcomes in Patients With Aortic Stenosis (Narrowing of the Major Blood Vessel of the Heart)(MK-0653A-043 AM4)(COMPLETED)

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients aged 45 to 85 with mild abnormalities of the aortic valve as confirmed by an echocardiogram.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients previously in a trial using the study drug, or currently taking any medications that are not allowed in this study.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants That Experienced One or More Components of the Composite Clinical Endpoint of MCE (Major Cardiovascular Events)
outcomeMeasures.description: Composite endpoint of MCE consists of cardiovascular death, AVR (aortic valve replacement) surgery, CHF(congestive heart failure) as a result of progression of aortic stenosis, nonfatal MI (myocardial infarction), CABG (coronary artery bypass) surgery, PCI (percutaneous coronary intervention), hospitalized unstable angina, and nonhemorrhagic stroke

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants That Experienced One or More Components of the Composite Clinical Endpoint of AVE (Aortic Valve Events)
outcomeMeasures.description: Composite endpoint of AVE (aortic valve events) consists of AVR surgery, CHF (as a result of progression of AS), or cardiovascular death

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants That Experienced One or More Components of the Composite Clinical Endpoint of ICE (Ischemic Cardiovascular Events)
outcomeMeasures.description: Composite endpoint of ICE (ischemic cardiovascular events) consists of cardiovascular death, nonfatal MI, CABG, PCI, hospitalized unstable angina, and nonhemorrhagic stroke

outcomeMeasures.title: Cardiovascular Death
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of participants that experienced cardiovascular death

outcomeMeasures.title: Aortic Valve Replacement (AVR)
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of participants that experienced aortic valve replacement (AVR)

outcomeMeasures.title: Congestive Heart Failure (CHF) Due to Progression of Aortic Stenosis (AS)
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of participants that experienced Congestive Heart Failure (CHF) due to progression of aortic stenosis (AS)

outcomeMeasures.title: Nonfatal Myocardial Infarction (MI)
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of participants that experienced nonfatal myocardial infarction (MI)

outcomeMeasures.title: Coronary Artery Bypass Grafting (CABG)
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of participants that experienced coronary artery bypass grafting (CABG)

outcomeMeasures.title: Percutaneous Coronary Intervention (PCI)
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of participants that experienced percutaneous coronary intervention (PCI)

outcomeMeasures.title: Hospitalization for Unstable Angina
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of participants that experienced hospitalization for unstable angina

outcomeMeasures.title: Nonhemorrhagic Stroke
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of participants that experienced nonhemorrhagic stroke

outcomeMeasures.title: Death (Any Cause)
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of participants that died (any cause)

outcomeMeasures.title: Death Due to Cancer
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of participants that died due to cancer

outcomeMeasures.title: Incident Cancer
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of participants with incident cancer

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Peak Transaortic Jet Velocity
outcomeMeasures.description: Mean change from baseline in peak transaortic jet velocity

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change in Time Weighted Average Total Cholesterol From Baseline to End of Follow-up
outcomeMeasures.description: Mean percent change (time-weighted average over follow-up) from baseline: Time-weighted average calculated using values at week 8, week 24, year 1 and every 6 months with time interval (days) between 2 successive values used as the weighting factor. For the first follow-up value, the weight was the number of days from randomization.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change in Time Weighted Average Low-density Lipoprotein Cholesterol (LDL-C) From Baseline to End of Follow-up
outcomeMeasures.description: Mean percent change (time-weighted average over follow-up) from baseline: Time-weighted average calculated using values at week 8, week 24, year 1 and every 6 months with time interval (days) between 2 successive values used as the weighting factor. For the first follow-up value, the weight was the number of days from randomization.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change in Time Weighted Average High-density Lipoprotein Cholesterol (HDL-C) From Baseline to End of Follow-up
outcomeMeasures.description: Mean percent change (time-weighted average over follow-up) from baseline: Time-weighted average calculated using values at week 8, week 24, year 1 and every 6 months with time interval (days) between 2 successive values used as the weighting factor. For the first follow-up value, the weight was the number of days from randomization.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change in Time Weighted Average Triglycerides From Baseline to End of Follow-up
outcomeMeasures.description: Mean percent change (time-weighted average over follow-up) from baseline: Time-weighted average calculated using values at week 8, week 24, year 1 and every 6 months with time interval (days) between 2 successive values used as the weighting factor. For the first follow-up value, the weight was the number of days from randomization.
